title: Lusit√¢nia
overview: A cursed wolf-child, two sisters battling each other to win a castle, a cocky Friar betting against the Devil; these are a few of Lusitania's stories. Lusitania is an anthology of six different tales that recount Iberian legends taken from a vast and rich folklore. This epic series deals in fantasy, horror, comedy and drama, weaving a tapestry of myths and legends.
